price: Dhugumatti, isaannan amananii gaggaariis hojjatanii, salaatas gadi dhaabanii, zakaas kennan, warri sun mindaan isaanii gooftaa isaanii bira isaaniif jira. Sodaanis isaan irra hin jiru; isaan hin gaddanu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata lahum ajruhum ʿinda rabbihim walā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
